entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text: @realDonaldTrump @OANN Bro when you mishandled coronavirus, I expected that.  When you tanked the economy, I expected that, too.  You consistently misinterpret graphs and facts negative to your administration.  But to victim-blame by failing to explain physics?  Yeah, I expected that, too. #buggin
